name: 2022 The 6th International Conference on Algorithms, Computing and Systems
content: Publication: All papers will be strictly double blind reviewed by the program committee, and accepted papers of ICACS 2022 (after proper registration and presentation) will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9741-4), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
